articles.title: Coronavirus Live Updates: India Records Over 17,000 New Covid Cases, 13 Deaths In 24 Hours
articles.description: India has recorded 17,336 new COVID-19 cases in the last 24 hours, taking the total number of coronavirus infections to 4,33,62,294. According to Union Health Ministry data, the number of active cases increased to 88,284 in the country.
articles.content:
COVID-19 UPDATE - JUNE 24India records 17,336 new COVID-19 cases in the last 24 hours - a 30% jump from the previous day

articles.title: Uddhav Thackeray meets Sharad Pawar, calls Sena's national executive meet tomorrow
articles.description: Chief Minister Uddhav Thackeray has called Shiv Sena's national executive meeting tomorrow as the political crisis deepens in Maharashtra. Here are the top points.

articles.title: "Eknath Shinde's Son An MP, Yet My Son Is Targeted": Uddhav Thackeray
articles.description: Uddhav Thackeray, the Maharashtra Chief Minister reduced to a minority in his own party by a stunning revolt, said today the Shiv Sena rebels are "trying to break the party" and added: "Why would I feel bad about those who have left?"
